events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking info hasn't updated in days.
The reported issue about the delayed shipment has been categorized under Delivery Delay.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to assist with the delayed delivery case.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the delay in your order delivery.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking updates you have received so far?
My order number is 45327890, and the tracking status hasn’t changed from 'Shipment received by carrier' for over a week.
Thank you for the information. We will contact the carrier to investigate the delay and expedite your delivery as soon as possible.
Alright, I appreciate you looking into this. Please keep me updated on any progress.
We’ve confirmed with the carrier that your package is now out for delivery and should arrive within the next 24 hours.
Hi again! We wanted to check if your order arrived and if everything is satisfactory with your delivery experience.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and in good condition. Thank you for your help resolving the delay.
We are glad your order arrived safely. Closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
Please take a moment to fill out a short satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
